entry.title: [181] Libshits btfo yet again
entry.summary:
Remember that dude who was deported that libshits claimed was granted asylum?
Here's the full story. He was ordered to be deported by a judge in 2019.
Whoopsie!
https://www.newsweek.com/kilmar-armando-abrego-garcia-deported-el-salvador-maryland-father-ms13-2054507
The Real Story of the Maryland Father Deported to El Salvador By Mistake

As more stories emerge of the migrants deported from the United States to El Salvador, the "administrative error" that put Kilmar Armando Abrego Garcia, a Maryland father said to have legal status, on one of the planes has caused outrage among many Americans who see the deportation flights as a flagrant miscarriage of due process.

But the man's alleged gang ties have made this case more complex.

The U.S. government has long-argued that Abrego Garcia resident has ties to MS-13, a criminal gang that began in immigrant communities in Los Angeles with ties to Central and South American countries. His attorneys argue he doesn't have a criminal history and has never been charged with a crime in the U.S., El Salvador, or anywhere else.

In 2019 during an immigration hearing, a judge issued a removal order, but added a clause preventing Abrego Garcia's removal to El Salvador because there was enough evidence he could be persecuted if returned home.

That order appeared to have been missed by Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) a few weeks ago, when the Salvadoran national was put on a plane to his home country destined for its notorious CECOT prison, separating him from his U.S. citizen wife and disabled son, according to court filings.

"The government could have chosen to remove Mr. Abrego Garcia to any other country on earth, but did not," his attorneys wrote in a court filing Friday. "The government could later have filed a motion to reopen proceedings against Mr. Abrego Garcia and seek to set aside the order of protection, but did not."

entry.title: [ 53] Trump causes S&P to lose $2.4 trillion in value
entry.summary:
https://www.reuters.com/markets/sp-500-loses-24-trillion-market-value-biggest-one-day-loss-since-2020-2025-04-03/

Biggest one day loss of value since his previous record in 2020

April 3 (Reuters) - S&P 500 companies lost a combined $2.4 trillion in stock market value in Thursday's selloff on Wall Street, their biggest one-day loss in value since the emerging coronavirus pandemic sent global markets into a tailspin on March 16, 2020.
The S&P 500 ended down almost 5% after U.S. President Donald Trump's ignited fears of an all-out trade war and a global economic recession.

entry.title: [ 92] Woman kicked out of women's tournament for refusing to fence a man
entry.summary:
https://www.foxnews.com/sports/womens-fencer-reveals-why-she-refused-face-transgender-opponent-accepting-punishment-backlash

Women's fencer opens up on refusing to face transgender opponent, accepting punishment and backlash

The female fencer says the issue has turned her from a lifelong Democrat to a conservative Republican

Women's fencer Stephanie Turner took her mask off and got a knee in front of her transgender opponent.

Ahead of a bout at the Cherry Blossom Open in Maryland over the weekend, Turner, 31, made the decision not to compete against trans athlete Redmond Sullivan. And Turner also wanted to make sure her refusal was caught on video for the world to see.

"I took a knee immediately at that point. Redmond was under the impression that I was going to start fencing. So when I took the knee, I looked at the ref and I said, ‘I’m sorry, I cannot do this. I am a woman, and this is a man, and this is a women's tournament. And I will not fence this individual.'

"Redmond didn't hear me, and he comes up to me, and he thinks that I may be hurt, or he doesn't understand what's happening. He asks, ‘Are you OK?’ And I said, ‘I’m sorry. I have much love and respect for you, but I will not fence you."

And right after that, Turner's punishment by USA Fencing commenced.


[At this point the article has a video with a poll by NYT showing that only 18% of Americans think that men should be allowed in women's sports]

entry.title: [275] /fwt/ - Friendly Windows Thread
entry.summary:
FAQ:
>How do I activate Windows?
github.com/massgravel/Microsoft-Activation-Scripts
HWID2 generates and registers a permanent legitimate license on MS's activation servers
Usage: paste into Powershell, run. Or: paste into Notepad, save as .ps1, run.
irm https://get.activated.win | iex

>and Office?
Same method, use Ohook
You can also use Office.com if your needs are very minimal
or try OnlyOffice/LibreOffice and set it to save in MSOffice file formats

>What version should I install?
W10 Enterprise IoT LTSC 2021
>Binary identical to Enterprise except no MS Store or apps
>Can install MS Store from cmd with: wsreset -i
>Alternatively use winget for apps
>Preinstalled with: Edge & Win32 system apps
>10 years support on "IoT LTSC", 5 for "LTSC"
>Manual version upgrades

W11 Enterprise IoT LTSC 2024
>Same as W10 version except:
>UI written in React Native aka JavaScript including: Start, Taskbar and Explorer
>Use only if you fell for the 12th+ gen Intel meme and need the new CPU scheduler
>Wait for IoT LTSC 2027 if you can

W10/W11 Home/Pro/Education/Enterprise/Enterprise IoT
>Preinstalled with: Edge, Win32 system apps, MS Store, OneDrive, Weather, Movies, Music, Netflix, Amazon, Spotify, Candy Crush, etc
>Auto-reinstalls apps on feature updates
>1.5-3 years support
>Forced version upgrades

>ISOs:
Windows IoT LTSC https://pastebin.com/ywkasnhM
Windows https://pastebin.com/nUMgAr0b
Office https://pastebin.com/G8w5qu6z

>Should I debloat / build my own ISO?
If you need to ask, then no.
If you know what you're doing:
https://pastebin.com/S5VKBirt

>Portable programs & reinstall-proofing
https://pastebin.com/Zh7WSbJ2

>Useful programs (new installs, essentials, utilities, adobe, etc)
https://pastebin.com/hN8nnwns

>I miss Windows##
OpenShell/RetroBar/WinClassic/StartIsBack


>LTSC Install Guides
https://rentry.org/windowsinstallguide
https://rentry.org/concisewin10
https://rentry.org/ltsc

entry.title: [ 78] Please stop calling this "BBQ" or "Barbecue". It's grilling, or cooking out, or
entry.summary: Please stop calling this "BBQ" or "Barbecue". It's grilling, or cooking out, or having a cookout. I'll even accept a barbie, it's derived enough. But calling it barbecue just makes it confusing to those unaware of what actual barbecue is (the sovthern tradition of smoking meat and other food items for a protracted amount of time, infusing the smoke flavor into the food, often using a sauce, rub, or mop to create an outer layer on the end product).

entry.title: [ 51] what strange / spooky stuff have you seen? once when i was in the desert, th
entry.summary:
what strange / spooky stuff have you seen?

once when i was in the desert, there was a telephone pole, on it looked exactly like a 10ft tall bird of prey, just eyeing me down
it was about a good 5min of walking, which felt like forever, just to see that it was a transformer that looked weird, none of the other poles had it either
sounds dumb, but it really did look exactly like a gigantic human sized hawk, and the "head" even seemed to follow you too, really interesting illusion, since it also hit all the primal parts of the brain that gone "you're about to be fucking eaten by a bird!!!!!!"
a year or two later, when i was gonna take a picture, it was gone, which adds a strange air to "it was right there, i tell you!"

>inb4 go to /x/ for this shit
i want real stories, not >i smelled the rotten shit fart gas, and my best friend was turned into a skinwalker, and then i pulled out that gun from videogame and blasted it, dude trust me

entry.title: [152] /out/ings with a pipe
entry.summary:
Old thread: >>2774508

This is a thread for enjoying a pipe while doing outdoor activities. If you ask why this belongs on /out/, you've never spent an evening by the campfire with a pipe silently enjoying the nature around you, and you're missing out.

>how to get started
Purchase a Missouri Meerschaum Legend and a pouch of Half and Half or Captain Black tobacco, available at most smoke shops. You will need a lighter or match, and something to tamp it with--a large nail works well if you don't have a pipe tool. Fill the pipe with tobacco, pack it down halfway, top it off, pack it down to 3/4, top it off again, pack gently and enjoy. Smoke slower than you think you need to, the tobacco tastes best when it is burning cool. Tamp and re-light as needed. If you still have trouble, try different methods on YouTube until you find one that works for you.

>smoking a pipe will give you cancer
While any tobacco consumption comes with some risk, the cancer risks from occasional pipe use are pretty minimal. Educate yourself and make your own informed health decisions. Some info here https://aacrjournals.org/cancerpreventionresearch/article/10/12/704/46541/Association-between-Cigar-or-Pipe-Smoking-and

>muh weed
Not the time or place. Start your own thread

>I DON’T LIKE WHAT YOU LIKE REEEEEE
Then leave the thread. Pipes have been a part of outdoors culture for centuries. If you don’t like it, leave.

entry.title: [ 63] Redesign just for the sake of redesign.
entry.summary:
>Classic DK:
>Strong protruding brow ridge which provides brutish/masculine appearance to DK yet is offset by his consistent smile which gives him a serious and determined, yet playful in nature appearance.
>Classic cool factor provided by the pompadour-like tuft of hair on his head that transitions into sideburn-like hair as it goes down to his ears to compliment his classic-cool appearance and demeanor.

>Nu-DK:
>Arches above each eye socket to provide a neutral, yet indistinctive facial expression at all times.
>Tuft of hair at the top of head just sticks up and out without and distinct design or shape. Hair in between ears and eyes is indistinctive and shows no form or design purpose.
>Makes expressive yet incredibly cartoony faces, which makes him look more like a goofy cartoon character.
>Flaring nostrils that stick up and out which don't compliment the rest of Nu-DK's facial composition.

It's clear to me the direction of Nu-DK is to make him less masculine and more appealing to all audiences, male or female, young or old. To make his appearance as neutral and goofy as possible, yet he loses the "cool" factor that had been established through his classic design. What's the point of redesigning a character if the redesign itself doesn't even improve the innate aesthetic of the original character design?

entry.title: [ 33] LEAK: SONY PLANNING TO LAUNCH PC DIGITAL STOREFRONT BY 2026
entry.summary: >A recent leak suggests that Sony is planning to launch its own PC digital storefront by 2026, signaling a major shift in the company’s strategy to expand its presence in the PC gaming market and compete more directly with platforms like Steam and the Epic Games Store. entry.title: [304] AI Pokemon Thread /NAPT/ Thread 171: Hyperrealistic Edition
entry.summary:
This is a general thread for people to post their AI art, and make requests from others who may want to attempt making their own Pokemon related gens.

NovelAI is a paid AI generator. Opus tier users have "unlimited" Small/Normal generations, though editing tools require credits.

Microsoft's Bing AI is a free image generator that is powered by DALL·E 3.

Civitai is free using its ‘buzz’ currency. You get about 50 every day plus more for liking models and gens.
>civitai.com

Otaiku is a (mostly) free mobile app. An ad watch is required between each image generation unless you pay.
>ailla.biz/otaiku

Tensor is free to use as well, although you are limited to how many gens you can make per day.
>https://tensor.art/

Local Generation using Stable Diffusion requires a decent video card. Guides for local genning can be found in the /g/ threads:
>>>/g/sdg
>>>/g/ldg
Other Stable Diffusion threads are on: /h/, /e/, /d/, /b/, /vt/, /aco/, /trash/

Hailuo AI takes uploaded art and animates them based on the prompts you get. You get a 3-day free trial, followed by roughly 3 free gens a day afterward. Subscription plans are available.
>https://hailuoai.video/

Pastebin of Pokemon artists:
>https://pastebin.com/U0mmK3Tm (embed)

Characters with under 300 images will require more tags to have them look correct. This is a list of all Pokemon characters with over 300 images:
>https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts?tags=*_%28pokemon%29+&z=5

If you plan on sharing multiple images together, we'd recommend posting just one, and give links for the rest. This way we can conserve space.

This is a locally run html tool provided by ThatOneAiAnon. It keeps track of all artists you like and turns Danbooru's entire tag system in a collapsible list of buttons. You can edit all the js, css, html code to modify the tool. (Ask him for updated versions or more Nai4 tools)
>mega .nz/file/67xwTRSB#m0fPUmJRaWd3oh47gt6nw2LKNMe820TaiKdXTAhx8tI

Previous Thread: >>57660381

entry.summary:
A thread for the creation and discussion of fan fiction and other fanworks - anything that involves a story and/or reading. What've you been reading? What've you been writing? What would you like to see more of?

>Thread question:
What happened in Orre? It's a vast desert, sure, by why are there essentially no wild pokemon? Why are all the buildings so old and ramshackle like it's made from scavenged junk? Basically, why does it look post-apocalyptic?

entry.title: [125] /4ccg/ - 4chan Cup General
entry.summary:
Previous: >>>/vg/519649929

>What... is this?
Put simply, a simulation of Pro Evolution Soccer being competed between teams which are embodiments of boards of the 4chan imageboard. The players represent facets of each board's culture. All of the matches are AI versus AI. However, humans "manage" each team, creating their tactics and giving input during games as they happen to make substitutions and tactical changes as they see fit.
https://implyingrigged.info/wiki/FAQ

>Where can I watch the cup?
https://isthisliv.com/4cc/stream.html

>Upcoming Cup
https://implyingrigged.info/wiki/2025_4chan_Spring_Babby_Cup

>Current Invitationals
https://implyingrigged.info/wiki//vt/_League_8

>Upcoming Invitationals
BE

>Wiki:
https://implyingrigged.info/wiki/Main_Page

>Booru
https://isthisliv.com/booru/

>Other videos
https://implyingrigged.info/wiki/Videos

>PES Info
https://implyingrigged.info/wiki/Pro_Evolution_Soccer_2017

>Previously

TEX: Wyatt Langford hit a tiebreaking two-run homer off Mason Montgomery in the bottom of the seventh as the Rangers bested the Rays 8-6 on Saturday
LAA: Yoán Moncada (thumb) is not expected to return to the lineup until Tuesday at the earliest
NYY: Trent Grisham hit a pair of homers off Bailey Falter in the Yankees’ 10-4 defeat of the Pirates on Saturday
BAL: Jackson Holliday went 3-for-4 with a triple and two RBI in Baltimore’s 8-1 victory over the Royals on Saturday
LAD: Tanner Scott tossed a scoreless three-pitch ninth inning to record the save against the Pirates on Saturday
NYM: Luis Torrens was scratched from Saturday’s lineup against the Blue Jays with a bruised forearm
WAS: James Wood went 1-for-3 with a two-run double in the Nationals’ 4-2 win over the Diamondbacks on Saturday
CIN: Matt McLain was scratched from Saturday’s lineup against the Brewers due to a tight left hamstring

entry.title: [127] /nrl/ - Rugby League General - Sunday - Round 5 concludes
entry.summary:
Mr Anderson edition

NRL
>GAME 1
Manly Sea-Eagles v Melbourne Storm
4:05pm AEST on Ch9, Fox and Kayo
4 Pines Park, Sydney
2.90-1.42
>DCE & Cameron Munster have been SOO halves partners on 15 occasions. It's mate against mate in an intense club rivalry that is overflowing with drama as bitter rivals Manly and Melbourne face off. The Sea Eagles have been the competition’s most potent attacking side in the opening four rounds, winning three out of four of their games. Melbourne arrive on the back of a shock 6-point defeat to the Dragons. The Storm are still finding their groove and will be desperate to bounce back after last week’s loss
Sea-Eagles 1-12 3.80
Sea-Eagles 13+ 7.50
Storm 1-12 2.90
Storm 13+ 2.45
Sea-Eagles +7.5 1.90 Storm -7.5 1.90

>GAME 2
Canterbury Bulldogs v Newcastle Knights
6:15pm AEST on Fox and Kayo
Accor Stadium, Sydney
1.42-2.92
>The Bulldogs look to make it five from five for 2025 as they host the Knights who are fresh off the bye. After a dominant defensive display against the Sharks, the Bulldogs are flying high, Canterbury’s defensive resilience was on full display as they held Cronulla to just one try on their way to the top of the ladder. The Knights are looking to bounce back after a heavy defeat to the Titans before their bye. They struggled big time against the Gold Coast, conceding 26 points in a disappointing outing
Bulldogs 1-12 2.75
Bulldogs 13+ 2.50
Knights 1-12 3.90

entry.title: [304] Cat girl (webtoon)
entry.summary:
Plot:
>An epidemic of loneliness, shut-ins and social isolation has swept the entire world but affecting primarily young men ages 18-30. With internet addiction, social rejection, romantic rejection and other forms of social isolation self-imposed for other reasons, corporations eventually sought out a solution inspired by online forums of the afflicted. The genetically engineered super companions.

https://www.webtoons.com/en/canvas/cat-girl/list?title_no=666229
first episode: https://www.webtoons.com/en/canvas/cat-girl/genetically-engineered-super-companions/viewer?title_no=666229&episode_no=1

This comic is by gloomypunks. Unlike other a lot of other webtoons, there's been quite a few threads about it before (as the topic relates to 4chan more than others). I think I've seen fanart of it from /co/.

entry.title: [120] /jpg/ - Japan General
entry.summary:
Osaka Edition

ー How do I travel by public transportation? ー
Use Google Maps within cities, install the Jorudan or Navitime app for intercity travel

ー What should I see in <place>? ー
https://www.wikivoyage.org/
https://www.japan-guide.com/
https://www.jnto.go.jp/
>Solid general guides - sights, sample itineraries, pre-travel considerations, etc
https://www.google.com/maps/d/edit?mid=1fmfaySQHmojbRGKWCwRecq6Ln1Bb2Xdh&ll=35.67928012473078%2C139.68638283648374&z=12
*You should check on google if a place is still in business before you plan to visit it*

ーJR Passー
Since JR has adjusted the prices for the pass, not really worth it anymore, unless you want to travel by train very extensively. You can plug in your itinerary in the links below and compare prices to the JR Pass.
>https://japantravel.navitime.com/en/area/jp/route/
>https://world.jorudan.co.jp/mln/en/
With the increased price of the JR Pass, local train passes might be good deals now.
>https://www.japan-guide.com/e/e2357.html

New prices starting May 2024
>7 day Pass: ¥50,000
>14 day Pass: ¥80,000
>21 day Pass: ¥100,000
https://www.japan-guide.com/railpass/

ーInfo on Degeneracy ー
READ THE INFO LISTED HERE. STOP TALKING ABOUT IT IN THE THREAD.

>https://chn.cityheaven.net/
>https://rockitrisingsun.com
>https://paradise-tokyo.net
>https://hentaitokyo.com
>https://tokyoadultguide.com/

entry.title: [ 90] /rcg/ - /tpg/ - Roller Coaster General | Theme Park General
entry.summary:
>Last Thread: >>2772245
Walt Edition

>What is this thread? Why are there two generals?
/rcg/ was initially created as a way for the roller coaster enthusiasts on here to discuss all things roller coasters and theme parks. While roller coasters are the main focus of these threads (and the title of the general) there is also discussion on other theme parks, their rides, as well as the parks themselves and trip planning too. That's where /tpg/ comes in.
>Can I talk about Disney/Universal parks in this thread?
Absolutely! Disney discussion of all sorts including rides/resorts/dining/trip planning is OK.

Thread Pro Tip: Talk about roller coasters!

Park Crowd Tracker:
>https://queue-times.com/en-US/parks

Roller Coaster Database:
>https://rcdb.com/

Amusement Park News Sites:
>https://www.themeparkinsider.com/
>https://www.screamscape.com/
>https://www.coaster101.com/

Disney Park News:
>https://www.wdwnt.com/
>https://www.wdwmagic.com/
>https://www.allears.net
>https://www.mousesteps.com

Epic Universe is almost ready to open so expect spoilers to be posted!

entry.title: [ 88] >Not long after President Donald Trump’s inauguration, the administration’s
entry.summary:
>Not long after President Donald Trump’s inauguration, the administration’s economic staff went to work on a daunting task: determining tariff rates for dozens of countries to fulfill the president’s campaign pledge of imposing “reciprocal” trade barriers.
>After weeks of work, aides from several government agencies produced a menu of options meant to account for a wide range of trading practices, according to three people familiar with the matter.
>Instead, Trump personally selected a formula that was based on two simple variables — the trade deficit with each country and the total value of its U.S. exports.

https://www.washingtonpost.com/politics/2025/04/04/trump-tariffs-reason-advisers/

So yeah, here's your final confirmation: He's retarded. There's nothing more to it. There's no conspiracy, he's not playing 5D chess, there isn't a grand plan, he is not doing this for (insert seemingly rational reason). He is a fucking retard. That's it. He is retarded in the clinical sense of the term.

The real problem is that he has surrounded himself with yesmen and has complete control over the GOP, both houses of Congress, the White House and the conservative movement as such, so there is no one left to stop this madness. Even if you are pro-tariff, please understand that the way in which this was calculated is beyond retarded and that he has no plans whatsoever as to how to reindustrialize the country. He literally thinks everything will just fall into place on its own because he has absolutely no understanding of trade, deficits, and the economy.

Again, the man is a complete and utter moron and he is destroying the global economy because he is retarded.
